title: For Trade: T210-2 Bonner SGC A
author: Jason Carota

posts.post_title: For Trade: T210-2 Bonner SGC A
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade my T210 Bonner for a low grade (raw or graded) E90-1 Charley Hall.  Trade and cash in your favor if needed.
